metrics.name: Orders Manufactured On Time
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(distinct "case_id") FILTER (WHERE
"Order Actual Start" <= "Order Planned Start" AND
"Order Actual Completion" <= "Order Planned Completion")

metrics.name: Average Cycle Time for Routing Step
metrics.description: Average time between Start and Complete of a certain Routing step
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ((SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME LIKE ${routing_step_end})) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME LIKE ${routing_step_start})))

metrics.name: Average Time from Production Order to Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Average Time from Production Order to Goods Receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Receipt'))) - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Production Order'))))

metrics.name: Completed Orders
metrics.description: Production order deliveries status â€“ 100% completed

metrics.name: Delayed Time at Order start
metrics.description: Average difference between actual start and scheduled start of order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ("Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start") 
FILTER (WHERE "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes')

metrics.name: Number of Orders Delayed in Completion
metrics.signalFragment:
count(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Order Actual Start" IS NOT NULL
	AND "Order Actual Completion" - "Order Scheduled Completion" > DURATION '0minutes')

metrics.name: Number of Orders Delayed in Start
metrics.description: Number of orders where the actual start is delayed
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE "Order Actual Start" IS NOT NULL AND "Order Actual Start" - "Order Scheduled Start" > DURATION '0minutes')

metrics.name: Time from Production Order to SFC Creation
metrics.description: Avg Time taken from Production Order creation to Shop Floor Control creation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = ('Create Shop Floor Control'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = ('Create Production Order'))))
   )

metrics.name: Work in Progress Time
metrics.description: Average time between completion of one step and start of the next step
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	FILTER( WHERE ${step_end_condition}))
- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
    	FILTER( WHERE ${step_start_condition}))
)

metrics.name: First Pass Yield Rate
metrics.description: SFC Build Quantity that don't have NC logged against total SFC GR Quantity
metrics.signalFragment: SUM ("SFC Build Quantity") FILTER (WHERE "SFC Routing Type" != 'NC') / SUM ("SFC Received Quantity")

metrics.name: Partially Completed Orders
metrics.description: Orders that are not completed and GR quantity is available
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE 
"Order Execution Status"!='COMPLETED' AND "Order Received Quantity" > 0)

variables.name: step_start_condition
variables.description: Step Start Condition ,for example event_name LIKE 'Start %Paint%' AND "Routing Step" ='0020'

variables.name: step_end_condition
variables.description: Step End Condition ,for example event_name LIKE 'Complete %Paint%' AND "Routing Step" ='0010'
